creator.description:
Making the truth transparent to all. Now fact-checking Bluesky. Newsdetective.org.

Subscribe to News Detective. Then, to report posts for fact-checking, click "..." under posts and click "report post."

locales.description: This label is given to satiric posts. To see why this post was labeled this way (or to disagree) go to newsdetective.org.
locales.name: Satire

locales.description: This label is given to facts that are not possible to fact-check due to the unavailability of information.To see why this post was labeled this way (or to disagree) go to newsdetective.org.
locales.name: No available information

locales.description: This label is given to facts that cannot be confirmed since they are a personal opinion or other type of uncheckable content. To see why this post was labeled this way (or to disagree) go to newsdetective.org.
locales.name: Can't be true or false (Opinion, poem, etc.)

locales.description: This label is given to facts that are partially true but tend to exaggerate. To see why this post was labeled this way (or to disagree) go to newsdetective.org.
locales.name: Exaggerated/ Misleading

locales.description: This label is given to facts that are deemed to be false. To see why this post was labeled this way (or to disagree) go to newsdetective.org.
locales.name: False Fact

locales.description: This label is given to facts that are deemed to be true. To see why this post was labeled this way (or to disagree) go to newsdetective.org.
locales.name: True Fact
